TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
Probably because older people are too big to fit into this live "X" box.

So which is heavier, 1 ton of steel or 1 ton of feathers? :-/

None of those.

what's the number of results for the formula aÃ‚Â³ + bÃ‚Â³ = cÃ‚Â³?

Yes, a=b=c=0. Take that, Fermat!

Why are people afraid of spiders?

Because NOPE

Who can it be now?

me.

How old will i be in 50 years?

By approximately fifty years I think.

What is the sound of a one hand clapping?

*fapping

Which flavor of milkshake will bring the girls to the yard?

I could teach you, but I'd have to charge.

Why is pop music so bad?

There is not answer to this question, especially after...shall i even mention his name.... J***** B*****. however some pop music, like music from who was previously half mentioned, makes me wish my ears would do exactly that. pop.

What are we going to do about brownies?

Eat 'em.

What are brownies gonna do about US?

Make them chubby!

How do I kill a brownie?

With the square root of watermelon.

What is the dolphin metal?

Dolphinium.

What can you do for your country?

forget to ask questions

what is the best way to waste time?

Die

I want to drop this antimatter container how do I do It?

by throwing how else

why can't i see the future?

Because the future you can't see the past you, either.

Why can't I think of a question to ask here?

Because there are too many questions to ask.

What is an question anyway?

An interogative sentence.

Why do I use the Metric system in North Carolina?!

Because when you talk oranges say hello but monks cry when toasters are left alone all night so purple plays bingo

How do i spell help?

help

why did you ask when you get the answer ? in the rules

Edited June 3, 2014 by WinkAllKerb''
typo

Because... science.

Is there any good dramatic/epic music that's actually royalty free under the Creative Commons License?

(Just as an example, though it isn't CC)

Two words: Kevin MacLeod.

Is there any better metal music than Rammstein?

Go up really fast, go sideways really fast.

Is Britney Spears still crazy?

Duh, noob. 1 Direction, Justin Bieber, Selena Gomez and Nicky Minaj
